Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MOJI0> registration will begin at
<BLUE><MOJI2></BLUE>. Please come back then.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Contestants in today's event may receive prizes.
However, I could not help but notice your bag
seems full.
<PAGE>
It would be a pity if you were a winner and were
unable to receive your prize. Please open a slot
or two in your bag and come back again.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To participate in the <RED><MOJI0></RED>, you
will need <BLUE><MOJI1></BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Please come back when you have <BLUE><MOJI1></BLUE>
prepared.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We will be accepting registrations until <BLUE><MOJI3></BLUE>,
so please come back if you change your mind.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you want to participate in the
<RED><MOJI0></RED>?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Which category would you like to place an entry
in?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please choose the <MOJI1> you
would like to submit for entry.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please choose the <MOJI1> you
would like to submit for entry.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You'd like to cancel your entry?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Very good. This <MOJI1> will be your
entry?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Excellent. You may put together the outfit you
would like to display in the dressing room.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Would you prefer a male or a female model for
your outfit?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please decide which outfit you would like to
display today.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Excellent. The festivities will begin shortly.
Please wait just a moment.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good, good. <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> will be
your entry in the <RED><MOJI4> Category</RED>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please choose which category you'd like to
submit an entry for.
Please choose the dishes for your course.
That is the dish you wish to enter?
You'd like to cancel your selection?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please choose the drinks you would like to
present to the guests.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If the time just doesn't work for you, we can
cancel today's <RED>Tea Party</RED>. Do you want to do
that?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Very good. Are these the drinks you would like
to serve?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Excellent. I will bring our guests to your house.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Please choose the animal you'd like to submit
for entry.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Please choose the pet you'd like to submit for
entry.

We will provide models to display your outfits
during the Fashion Show.

You may choose the looks, outfit, hat, glasses
and accessories for your model.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, yes. Today's festival is part of a public field
challenge. Good luck.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, yes. Today's festival is part of a public field
challenge. Also, I've received word that
<CHARANAME1> will also be participating.
<PAGE>
That should certainly liven things up. Good luck.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, yes. Today's festival is part of a public field
challenge. And just to let you know, I've received
word that there will be a pair of new challengers.
<PAGE>
Both <CHARANAME1> and <CHARANAME2>
will also be participating in the challenge.
<PAGE>
I'll bet that should shake things up. At any rate,
good luck.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To begin the <RED><MOJI0></RED>, you will
need some <BLUE><MOJI1></BLUE>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Please come back when you have some
prepared.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think it would be better if we held the Tea Party
when you have a larger house.
<PAGE>
I know you've been looking forward to it, but
you'll get more enjoyment from it after you've
grown more prosperous.
